body_content.explanation: a piece of clothing that covers the whole body and head, with many strips of cloth hanging from it, that is worn by soldiers, especially snipers (= soldiers who shoot at people from a hidden place), or hunters, in order to be able to hide among plants, grass, etc.:
examples: The soldiers jumped out of the jeep wearing camouflage face paint and shaggy ghillie suits.
He explains that the main purpose of the ghillie suit is to break up the outline of the body.
